website_summaries.verdict: A well designed, compact, and affordable water gun.
pros: Super easy for children to fill and use
Solid build with a tough exterior
Lightweight enough for smaller children, yet just powerful enough to keep bigger kids entertained
cons: Smaller water capacity than more expensive or larger models

customer_reviews.title: Agreed!  Junk!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with the black cap cut from the body of the gun. Also the black cap is not tight at all and frequently comes loose. This is complete crap and should be taken off of the market!
customer_reviews.author: Les Ismore

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: Leaked water from day one.... then i dropped it on the ground and it broke open.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Waters

customer_reviews.title: 2 leaked out of 5 purchased
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 total 2 leaked and never worked properly, but 3 worked fine so my beautiful wife said....
customer_reviews.author: Doug Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Useless!
customer_reviews.text: Never worked from the start -- just dribbled --but not worth returning. Cheap price, cheap product. Went into the recycling bin.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: doesn’t work out of the box, took this to our vacation for my kids to play, did not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Water hun
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a couple weeks then broke. Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold water....literally!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a tool for my overzealous pups. It leaks EVERYWHERE, can’t even sit it down.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Cee

customer_reviews.title: Great water guns for my cat.
customer_reviews.text: Great squirt gun. So cute. The bright colors make them easy to spot when you're in need of a quick repellant for your furry cat. The water of a small water gun is very easy to spray out of the water, and the water is a few meters away.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great water gun.
customer_reviews.text: Great simple to use the water gun, it will provide many hours of fun cooling off the adventurous outdoors children. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Loop

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to squirt water, and it does just that.
customer_reviews.author: swilde

product_meta.title: HIG Water Gun for Kids Soaker Squirt Games
feature_bullets: ★High quality toys for children, Adults and children can play
★The product Suitable for children over 6 years old, Note: Do not shoot toward the eye, to avoid injuries
★Let the children more happy, Mom and Dad can be use water gun to accompany children to play
★Quick-fire trigger lets you fire a long-distance stream of water, Interesting water gun toy
